manzils.text: bel `acibu en caehum munzirum minhum fekale-lkafirune haza sey'un `acib
eiza mitna vekunna turaba. zalike rac`um be`id
kad `alimna ma tenkusu-l'ardu minhum. ve`indena kitabun hafiz
bel kezzebu bilhakki lemma caehum fehum fi emrim meric
efelem yenzuru ile-ssemai fevkahum keyfe beneynaha vezeyyennaha vema leha min furuc
vel'arda medednaha veelkayna fiha ravasiye veembetna fiha min kulli zevcim behic
venezzelna mine-ssemai maem mubaraken feembetna bihi cennativ vehabbe-lhasid
rizkal lil`ibadi veahyeyna bihi beldetem meyta. kezalike-lhuruc
kezzebet kablehum kavmu nuhiv veashabu-rrassi vesemud
veashabu-l'eyketi vekavmu tubba`. kullun kezzebe-rrusule fehakka ve`id
efe`ayina bilhalki-l'evvel. bel hum fi lebsim min halkin cedid
velekad halakne-l'insane vena`lemu ma tuvesvisu bihi nefsuh. venahnu akrabu ileyhi min habli-lverid
ma yelfizu min kavlin illa ledeyhi rakibun `atid
vecaet sekratu-lmevt bilhakk. zalike ma kunte minhu tehid
vecaet kullu nefsim me`aha saikuv vesehid
lekad kunte fi gafletim min haza fekesefna `anke gitaeke febesaruke-lyevme hadid
ellezi ce`ale me`a-llahi ilahen ahara feelkiyahu fi-l`azabi-ssedid
kale karinuhu rabbena ma atgaytuhu velakin kane fi dalalim be`id
kale la tahtesimu ledeyye vekad kaddemtu ileykum bilve`id
ma yubeddelu-lkavlu ledeyye vema ene bizallamil lil`abid
yevme nekulu licehenneme heli-mtele'ti vetekulu hel mim mezid
haza ma tu`adune likulli evvabin hafiz
men hasiye-rrahmane bilgaybi vecae bikalbim munib
lehum ma yesaune fiha veledeyna mezid
vekem ehlekna kablehum min karnin hum eseddu minhum batsen fenekkabu fi-lbilad. hel mim mehis
inne fi zalike lezikra limen kane lehu kalbun ev elka-ssem`a vehuve sehid
velekad halakne-ssemavati vel'arda vema beynehuma fi sitteti eyyam. vema messena mil lugub
fasbir `ala ma yekulune vesebbih bihamdi rabbike kable tulu`i-ssemsi vekable-lgurub
vestemi` yevme yunadi-lmunadi mim mekanin karib
yevme tesekkaku-l'ardu `anhum sira`a. zalike hasrun `aleyna yesir
nahnu a`lemu bima yekulune vema ente `aleyhim bicebbarin fezekkir bilkur'ani mey yehafu ve`id
zuku fitnetekum. haze-llezi kuntum bihi testa`cilun
ahizine ma atahum rabbuhum. innehum kanu kable zalike muhsinin
feverabbi-ssemai vel'ardi innehu lehakkum misle ma ennekum tentikun
iz dehalu `aleyhi fekalu selama. kale selam. kavmum munkerun
feraga ila ehlihi fecae bi`iclin semin
feevcese minhum hifeh. kalu la tehaf. vebesseruhu bigulamin `alim
feakbeleti-mraetuhu fi sarratin fesakket vecheha vekalet `acuzun `akim
kalu kezaliki kale rabbuk. innehu huve-lhakimu-l`alim
kalu inna ursilna ila kavmim mucrimin
fema vecedna fiha gayra beytim mine-lmuslimin
vefi musa iz erselnahu ila fir`avne bisultanim mubin
fetevella biruknihi vekale sahirun ev mecnun
feehaznahu vecunudehu fenebeznahum fi-lyemmi vehuve mulim
ma tezeru min sey'in etet `aleyhi illa ce`alethu kelramim
vefi semude iz kile lehum temette`u hatta hin
fe`atev `an emri rabbihim feehazethumu-ssa`ikatu vehum yenzurun
feme-steta`u min kiyamiv vema kanu muntesirin
vekavme nuhim min kabl. innehum kanu kavmen fasikin
vemin kulli sey'in halakna zevceyni le`allekum tezekkerun
fefirru ile-llah. inni lekum minhu nezirum mubin
vela tec`alu me`a-llahi ilahen ahar. inni lekum minhu nezirum mubin
kezalike ma ete-llezine min kablihim mir rasulin illa kalu sahirun ev mecnun
etevasav bih. bel hum kavmun tagun
ma uridu minhum mir rizkiv vema uridu ey yut`imun
feinne lillezine zalemu zenubem misle zenubi ashabihim fela yesta`cilun
feveylul lillezine keferu miy yevmihimu-llezi yu`adun
yevme yude``une ila nari cehenneme da``a
efesihrun haza em entum la tubsirun
islevha fasbiru ev la tasbiru. sevaun `aleykum. innema tuczevne ma kuntum ta`melun
fakihine bima atahum rabbuhum. vevekahum rabbuhum `azabe-lcehim
kulu vesrabu heniem bima kuntum ta`melun
vellezine amenu vettebe`athum zurriyyetuhum biimanin elhakna bihim zurriyyetehum vema eletnahum min `amelihim min sey'. kullu-mriim bima kesebe rahin
yetenaza`une fiha ke'sel la lagvun fiha vela te'sim
veyetufu `aleyhim gilmanul lehum keennehum lu'luum meknun
kalu inna kunna kablu fi ehlina musfikin
inna kunna min kablu ned`uh. innehu huve-lberru-rrahim
fezekkir fema ente bini`meti rabbike bikahiniv vela mecnun
em yekulune sa`irun neterabbesu bihi raybe-lmenun
em te'muruhum ahlamuhum bihaza em hum kavmun tagun
em yekulune tekavveleh. bel la yu'minun
felye'tu bihadisim mislihi in kanu sadikin
em huliku min gayri sey'in em humu-lhalikun
em haleku-ssemavati vel'ard. bel la yukinun
em lehum sullemuy yestemi`une fih. felye'ti mustemi`uhum bisultanim mubin
em tes'eluhum ecran fehum mim magramim muskalun
em yuridune keyda. fellezine keferu humu-lmekidun
em lehum ilahun gayru-llah. subhane-llahi `amma yusrikun
veiy yerav kisfem mine-ssemai sakitay yekulu sehabum merkum
fezerhum hatta yulaku yevmehumu-llezi fihi yus`akun
yevme la yugni `anhum keyduhum sey'ev vela hum yunsarun
veinne lillezine zalemu `azaben dune zalike velakinne ekserahum la ya`lemun
vasbir lihukmi rabbike feinneke bia`yunina vesebbih bihamdi rabbike hine tekum
in hiye illa esmaun semmeytumuha entum veabaukum ma enzele-llahu biha min sultan. iy yettebi`une ille-zzanne vema tehve-l'enfus. velekad caehum mir rabbihimu-lhuda
vekem mim melekin fi-ssemavati la tugni sefa`atuhum sey'en illa mim ba`di ey ye'zene-llahu limey yesau veyerda
inne-llezine la yu'minune bil'ahirati leyusemmune-lmelaikete tesmiyete-l'unsa
vema lehum bihi min `ilm. iy yettebi`une ille-zzanne. veinne-zzanne la yugni mine-lhakki sey'a
fea`rid `am men tevella `an zikrina velem yurid ille-lhayate-ddunya
zalike mebleguhum mine-l`ilm. inne rabbeke huve a`lemu bimen dalle `an sebilihi vehuve a`lemu bimeni-hteda
velillahi ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ardi liyecziye-llezine esau bima `amilu veyecziye-llezine ahsenu bilhusna

ellezine yectenibune kebaira-l'ismi velfevahise ille-llemem. inne rabbeke vasi`u-lmagfirah. huve a`lemu bikum iz enseekum mine-l'ardi veiz entum ecinnetun fi butuni ummehatikum. fela tuzekku enfusekum. huve a`lemu bimeni-tteka
em lem yunebbe' bima fi suhufi musa
veel leyse lil'insani illa ma se`a
vekavme nuhim min kabl. innehum kanu hum azleme veatga
veiy yerav ayetey yu`ridu veyekulu sihrum mustemirr
vekezzebu vettebe`u ehvaehum vekullu emrim mustekirr
velekad caehum mine-l'embai ma fihi muzdecer
fetevelle `anhum. yevme yed`u-dda`i ila sey'in nukur
husse`an ebsaruhum yahrucune mine-l'ecdasi keennehum ceradum muntesir
kezzebet kablehum kavmu nuhin fekezzebu `abdena vekalu mecnunuv vezducira
tecri bia`yunina. cezael limen kane kufira
velekat teraknaha ayeten fehel mim muddekir
velekad yesserne-lkur'ane lizzikri fehel mim muddekir
inna erselna `aleyhim rihan sarsaran fi yevmi nahsim mustemirr
velekad yesserne-lkur'ane lizzikri fehel mim muddekir
fekalu ebeseram minna vahiden nettebi`uhu inna izel lefi dalaliv vesu`ur
eulkiye-zzikru `aleyhi mim beynina bel huve kezzabun esir
inna mursilu-nnakati fitnetel lehum fertekibhum vastabir
venebbi'hum enne-lmae kismetum beynehum. kullu sirbim muhtedar
inna erselna `aleyhim sayhatev vahideten fekanu kehesimi-lmuhtezir
velekad yesserne-lkur'ane lizzikri fehel mim muddekir
inna erselna `aleyhim hasiben illa ale lut. necceynahum bisehar
ni`metem min `indina. kezalike neczi men sekera
velekad raveduhu `an dayfihi fetamesna a`yunehum fezuku `azabi venuzur
velekad yesserne-lkur'ane lizzikri fehel mim muddekir
kezzebu biayatina kulliha feehaznahum ahze `azizim muktedir
ekuffarukum hayrum min ulaikum em lekum beraetun fi-zzubur
yevme yushabune fi-nnari `ala vucuhihim. zuku messe sekara
vema emruna illa vahidetun kelemhim bilbesar
velekad ehlekna esya`akum fehel mim muddekir
yes'eluhu men fi-ssemavati vel'ard. kulle yevmin huve fi se'n
ya ma`sera-lcinni vel'insi ini-steta`tum en tenfuzu min aktari-ssemavati vel'ardi fenfuzu. la tenfuzune illa bisultan
yurselu `aleykuma suvazum min nariv venuhasun fela tentesiran
feyevmeizil la yus'elu `an zembihi insuv vela cann
muttekiine `ala furusim betainuha min istebrak. vecene-lcenneteyni dan
fihinne kasiratu-ttarfi lem yatmishunne insun kablehum vela cann
lem yatmishunne insun kablehum vela cann
la yesme`une fiha lagvev vela te'sima
vekanu yekulune eiza mitna vekunna turabev ve`izamen einna lemeb`usun
nahnu kadderna beynekumu-lmevte vema nahnu bimesbukin
ala en nubeddile emsalekum venunsiekum fi ma la ta`lemun
lev nesau lece`alnahu hutamen fezaltum tefekkehun
lev nesau ce`alnahu ucacen felevla teskurun
venahnu akrabu ileyhi minkum velakil la tubsirun
sebbeha lillahi ma fi-ssemavati vel'ard. vehuve-l`azizu-lhakim
lehu mulku-ssemavati vel'ard. yuhyi veyumit. vehuve `ala kulli sey'in kadir
huve-l'evvelu vel'ahiru vezzahiru velbatin. vehuve bikulli sey'in `alim

huve-llezi haleka-ssemavati vel'arda fi sitteti eyyamin summe-steva `ale-l`ars. ya`lemu ma yelicu fi-l'ardi vema yahrucu minha vema yenzilu mine-ssemai vema ya`rucu fiha. vehuve me`akum eyne ma kuntum. vellahu bima ta`melune besir
yulicu-lleyle fi-nnehari veyulicu-nnehara fi-lleyl. vehuve `alimum bizati-ssudur
aminu billahi verasulihi veenfiku mimma ce`alekum mustahlefine fih. fellezine amenu minkum veenfeku lehum ecrun kebir
vema lekum la tu'minune billah. verrasulu yed`ukum litu'minu birabbikum vekad ehaze misakakum in kuntum mu'minin
huve-llezi yunezzilu `ala `abdihi ayatim beyyinatil liyuhricekum mine-zzulumati ile-nnur. veinne-llahe bikum leraufur rahim

vema lekum ella tunfiku fi sebili-llahi velillahi mirasu-ssemavati vel'ard. la yestevi minkum men enfeka min kabli-lfethi vekatel. ulaike a`zamu deracetem mine-llezine enfeku mim ba`du vekatelu. vekullev ve`ade-llahu-lhusna. vellahu bima ta`melune habir
men ze-llezi yukridu-llahe kardan hasenen feyuda`ifehu lehu velehu ecrun kerim
yevme tera-lmu'minine velmu'minati yes`a nuruhum beyne eydihim vebieymanihim busrakumu-lyevme cennatun tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu halidine fiha. zalike huve-lfevzu-l`azim

yevme yekulu-lmunafikune velmunafikatu lillezine amenu-nzuruna naktebis min nurikum kile-rci`u veraekum feltemisu nura. feduribe beynehum bisuril lehu bab. batinuhu fihi-rrahmetu vezahiruhu min kibelihi-l`azab
yunadunehum elem nekum me`akum. kalu bela velakinnekum fetentum enfusekum veterabbastum vertebtum vegarratkumu-l'emaniyyu hatta cae emru-llahi vegarrakum billahi-lgarur
felyevme la yu'hazu minkum fidyetuv vela mine-llezine keferu. me'vakumu-nnar. hiye mevlakum. vebi'se-lmesir
elem ye'ni lillezine amenu en tahse`a kulubuhum lizikri-llahi vema nezele mine-lhakki vela yekunu kellezine utu-lkitabe min kablu fetale `aleyhimu-l'emedu fekaset kulubuhum. vekesirum minhum fasikun
i`lemu enne-llahe yuhyi-l'arda ba`de mevtiha. kad beyyenna lekumu-l'ayati le`allekum ta`kilun
inne-lmussaddikine velmussaddikati veakradu-llahe kardan haseney yuda`afu lehum velehum ecrun kerim
vellezine amenu billahi verusulihi ulaike humu-ssiddikun. vessuhedau `inde rabbihim. lehum ecruhum venuruhum. vellezine keferu vekezzebu biayatina ulaike ashabu-lcehim

i`lemu enneme-lhayatu-ddunya le`ibuv velehvuv vezinetuv vetefahurum beynekum vetekasurun fi-l'emvali vel'evlad. kemeseli gaysin a`cebe-lkuffara nebatuhu summe yehicu feterahu musferran summe yekunu hutama. vefi-l'ahirati `azabun sediduv vemagfiratum mine-llahi veridvan. veme-lhayatu-ddunya illa meta`u-lgurur
sabiku ila magfiratim mir rabbikum vecennetin `arduha ke`ardi-ssemai vel'ardi u`iddet lillezine amenu billahi verusulih. zalike fadlu-llahi yu'tihi mey yesa'. vellahu zu-lfadli-l`azim
ma esabe mim musibetin fi-l'ardi vela fi enfusikum illa fi kitabim min kabli en nebraeha. inne zalike `ale-llahi yesir
likeyla te'sev `ala ma fatekum vela tefrahu bima atakum. vellahu la yuhibbu kulle muhtalin fehur
ellezine yebhalune veye'murune-nnase bilbuhl. vemey yetevelle feinne-llahe huve-lganiyyu-lhamid

lekad erselna rusulena bilbeyyinati veenzelna me`ahumu-lkitabe velmizane liyekume-nnasu bilkist. veenzelne-lhadide fihi be'sun sediduv vemenafi`u linnasi veliya`leme-llahu mey yensuruhu verusulehu bilgayb. inne-llahe kaviyyun `aziz
velekad erselna nuhav veibrahime vece`alna fi zurriyyetihime-nnubuvvete velkitabe feminhum muhted. vekesirum minhum fasikun

summe kaffeyna `ala asarihim birusulina vekaffeyna bi`ise-bni meryeme veateynahu-l'incile vece`alna fi kulubi-llezine-ttebe`uhu ra'fetev verahmeh. verahbaniyyeten-btede`uha ma ketebnaha `aleyhim ille-btigae ridvani-llahi fema ra`avha hakka ri`ayetiha. feateyne-llezine amenu minhum ecrahum. vekesirum minhum fasikun
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu-tteku-llahe veaminu birasulihi yu'tikum kifleyni mir rahmetihi veyec`al lekum nuran temsune bihi veyagfir lekum. vellahu gafurur rahim
liella ya`leme ehlu-lkitabi ella yakdirune `ala sey'im min fadli-llahi veenne-lfadle biyedi-llahi yu'tihi mey yesa'. vellahu zu-lfadli-l`azim
kad semi`a-llahu kavle-lleti tucadiluke fi zevciha vetesteki ile-llah. vellahu yesme`u tehavurakuma. inne-llahe semi`um besir
ellezine yuzahirune minkum min nisaihim ma hunne ummehatihim. in ummehatuhum ille-llai velednahum. veinnehum leyekulune munkeram mine-lkavli vezura. veinne-llahe le`afuvvun gafur
vellezine yuzahirune min nisaihim summe ye`udune lima kalu fetahriru rakabetim min kabli ey yetemassa. zalikum tu`azune bih. vellahu bima ta`melune habir

femel lem yecid fesiyamu sehrayni mutetabi`ayni min kabli ey yetemassa. femel lem yesteti` feit`amu sittine miskina. zalike litu'minu billahi verasulih. vetilke hududu-llah. velilkafirine `azabun elim
inne-llezine yuhaddune-llahe verasulehu kubitu kema kubite-llezine min kablihim vekad enzelna ayatim beyyinat. velilkafirine `azabum muhin
yevme yeb`asuhumu-llahu cemi`an feyunebbiuhum bima `amilu. ahsahu-llahu venesuh. vellahu `ala kulli sey'in sehid

elem tera enne-llahe ya`lemu ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. ma yekunu min necva selasetin illa huve rabi`uhum vela hamsetin illa huve sadisuhum vela edna min zalike vela eksera illa huve me`ahum eyne ma kanu. summe yunebbiuhum bima `amilu yevme-lkiyameh. inne-llahe bikulli sey'in `alim

elem tera ile-llezine nuhu `ani-nnecva summe ye`udune lima nuhu `anhu veyetenacevne bil'ismi vel`udvav vema`siyeti-rrasul. veiza cauke hayyevke bima lem yuhayyike bihi-llahu veyekulune fi enfusihim levla yu`azzibune-llahu bima nekul. hasbuhum cehennem. yaslevneha. febi'se-lmesir
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu iza tenaceytum fela tetenacev bil'ismi vel`udvani vema`siyeti-rrasuli vetenacev bilbirri vettakva. vetteku-llahe-llezi ileyhi tuhserun
inneme-nnecva mine-sseytani liyahzune-llezine amenu veleyse bidarrihim sey'en illa biizni-llah. ve`ale-llahi felyetevekkeli-lmu'minun

ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu iza kile lekum tefessehu fi-lmecalisi fefsehu yefsehi-llahu lekum. veiza kile-nsuzu fensuzu yerfe`i-llahu-llezine amenu minkum vellezine utu-l`ilme deracat. vellahu bima ta`melune habir
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu iza naceytumu-rrasule fekaddimu beyne yedey necvakum sadekaten. zalike hayrul lekum veather. feil lem tecidu feinne-llahe gafurur rahim
eesfaktum en tukaddimu beyne yedey necvakum sadekat. feiz lem tef`alu vetabe-llahu `aleykum feekimu-ssalate veatu-zzekate veeti`u-llahe verasuleh. vellahu habirum bima ta`melun
elem tera ile-llezine tevellev kavmen gadibe-llahu `aleyhim. ma hum minkum vela minhum veyahlifune `ale-lkezibi vehum ya`lemun
e`adde-llahu lehum `azaben sedida. innehum sae ma kanu ya`melun
ittehazu eymanehum cunneten fesaddu `an sebili-llahi felehum `azabum muhin
len tugniye `anhum emvaluhum vela evladuhum mine-llahi sey'a. ulaike ashabu-nnar. hum fiha halidun
yevme yeb`asuhumu-llahu cemi`an feyahlifune lehu kema yahlifune lekum veyahsebune ennehum `ala sey'. ela innehum humu-lkazibun
istahveze `aleyhimu-sseytanu feensahum zikra-llah. ulaike hizbu-sseytan. ela inne hizbe-sseytani humu-lhasirun
ketebe-llahu leaglibenne ene verusuli. inne-llahe kaviyyun `aziz

la tecidu kavmey yu'minune billahi velyevmi-l'ahiri yuvaddune men hadde-llahe verasulehu velev kanu abaehum ev ebnaehum ev ihvanehum ev `asiratehum. ulaike ketebe fi kulubihimu-l'imane veeyyedehum biruhim minh. veyudhiluhum cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu halidine fiha. radiye-llahu `anhum veradu `anh. ulaike hizbu-llah. ela inne hizbe-llahi humu-lmuflihun
sebbeha lillahi ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. vehuve-l`azizu-lhakim

huve-llezi ahrace-llezine keferu min ehli-lkitabi min diyarihim lievveli-lhasr. ma zanentum ey yahrucu vezannu ennehum mani`atuhum husunuhum mine-llahi feetahumu-llahu min haysu lem yahtesibu vekazefe fi kulubihimu-rru`be yuhribune buyutehum bieydihim veeydi-lmu'minine fa`tebiru ya uli-l'ebsar
velevla en ketebe-llahu `aleyhimu-lcelae le`azzebehum fi-ddunya. velehum fi-l'ahirati `azabu-nnar
zalike biennehum sakku-llahe verasuleh. vemey yusakki-llahe feinne-llahe sedidu-l`ikab
ma kata`tum mil linetin ev teraktumuha kaimeten `ala usuliha febiizni-llahi veliyuhziye-lfasikin
vema efae-llahu `ala rasulihi minhum fema evceftum `aleyhi min hayliv vela rikabiv velakinne-llahe yusellitu rusulehu `ala mey yesa'. vellahu `ala kulli sey'in kadir

ma efae-llahu `ala rasulihi min ehli-lkura felillahi velirrasuli velizi-lkurba velyetama velmesakini vebni-ssebili key la yekune duletem beyne-l'agniyai minkum. vema atakumu-rrasulu fehuzuhu vema nehakum `anhu fentehu. vetteku-llah. inne-llahe sedidu-l`ikab
lilfukarai-lmuhacirine-llezine uhricu min diyarihim veemvalihim yebtegune fadlem mine-llahi veridvanev veyensurune-llahe verasuleh. ulaike humu-ssadikun

vellezine tebevveu-ddara vel'imane min kablihim yuhibbune men hacera ileyhim vela yecidune fi sudurihim hacetem mimma utu veyu'sirune `ala enfusihim velev kane bihim hasasah. vemey yuka suhha nefsihi feulaike humu-lmuflihun
vellezine cau mim ba`dihim yekulune rabbene-gfir lena veliihvanine-llezine sebekuna bil'imani vela tec`al fi kulubina gillel lillezine amenu rabbena inneke raufur rahim

elem tera ile-llezine nafeku yekulune liihvanihimu-llezine keferu min ehli-lkitabi lein uhrictum lenahrucenne me`akum vela nuti`u fikum ehaden ebedev vein kutiltum lenensurannekum. vellahu yeshedu innehum lekazibun
lein uhricu la yahrucune me`ahum. velein kutilu la yensurunehum. velein nesaruhum leyuvellunne-l'edbar. summe la yunsarun
leentum eseddu rahbeten fi sudurihim mine-llah. zalike biennehum kavmul la yefkahun
la yukatilunekum cemi`an illa fi kuram muhassanetin ev miv verai cudur. be'suhum beynehum sedid. tahsebuhum cemi`av vekulubuhum setta. zalike biennehum kavmul la ya`kilun
kemeseli-llezine min kablihim kariben zaku vebale emrihim. velehum `azabun elim
kemeseli-sseytani iz kale lil'insani-kfur. felemma kefera kale inni berium minke inni ehafu-llahe rabbe-l`alemin
fekane `akibetehuma ennehuma fi-nnari halideyni fiha. vezalike cezau-zzalimin
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu-tteku-llahe veltenzur nefsum ma kaddemet ligad. vetteku-llah. inne-llahe habirum bima ta`melun
vela tekunu kellezine nesu-llahe feensahum enfusehum. ulaike humu-lfasikun
la yestevi ashabu-nnari veashabu-lcenneh. ashabu-lcenneti humu-lfaizun
lev enzelna haze-lkur'ane `ala cebelil lera'eytehu hasi`am mutesaddi`am min hasyeti-llah. vetilke-l'emsalu nadribuha linnasi le`allehum yetefekkerun
huve-llahu-llezi la ilahe illa hu. `alimu-lgaybi vessehadeh. huve-rrahmanu-rrahim
huve-llahu-llezi la ilahe illa hu. elmeliku-lkuddusu-sselamu-lmu'minu-lmuheyminu-l`azizu-lcebbaru-lmutekebbir. subhane-llahi `amma yusrikun
huve-llahu-lhaliku-lbariu-lmusavviru lehu-l'esmau-lhusna. yusebbihu lehu ma fi-ssemavati vel'ard. vehuve-l`azizu-lhakim

ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu la tettehizu `aduvvi ve`aduvvekum evliyae tulkune ileyhim bilmeveddeti vekad keferu bima caekum mine-lhakk. yuhricune-rrasule veiyyakum en tu'minu billahi rabbikum. in kuntum haractum cihaden fi sebili vebtigae merdati tusirrune ileyhim bilmeveddeh. veena a`lemu bima ahfeytum vema a`lentum. vemey yef`alhu minkum fekad dalle sevae-ssebil
iy yeskafukum yekunu lekum a`daev veyebsutu ileykum eydiyehum veelsinetehum bissui veveddu lev tekfurun
len tenfe`akum erhamukum vela evladukum. yevme-lkiyameh. yefsilu beynekum. vellahu bima ta`melune besir

kad kanet lekum usvetun hasenetun fi ibrahime vellezine me`ah. iz kalu likavmihim inna buraau minkum vemimma ta`budune min duni-llah. keferna bikum vebeda beynena vebeynekumu-l`adavetu vebagdau ebeden hatta tu'minu billahi vahdehu illa kavle ibrahime liebihi leestagfiranne leke vema emliku leke mine-llahi min sey'. rabbena `aleyke tevekkelna veileyke enebna veileyke-lmesir
rabbena la tec`alna fitnetel lillezine keferu vagfir lena rabbena. inneke ente-l`azizu-lhakim
lekad kane lekum fihim usvetun hasenetul limen kane yercu-llahe velyevme-l'ahir. vemey yetevelle feinne-llahe huve-lganiyyu-lhamid
asa-llahu ey yec`ale beynekum vebeyne-llezine `adeytum minhum meveddeh. vellahu kadir. vellahu gafurur rahim
la yenhakumu-llahu `ani-llezine lem yukatilukum fi-ddini velem yuhricukum min diyarikum en teberruhum vetuksitu ileyhim. inne-llahe yuhibbu-lmuksitin
innema yenhakumu-llahu `ani-llezine katelukum fi-ddini veahracukum min diyarikum vezaheru `ala ihracikum en tevellevhum. vemey yetevellehum feulaike humu-zzalimun

ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu iza caekumu-lmu'minatu muhaciratin femtehinuhunn. allahu a`lemu biimanihinn. fein `alimtumuhunne mu'minatin fela terci`uhunne ile-lkuffar. la hunne hillul lehum vela hum yehillune lehunn. veatuhum ma enfeku. vela cunaha `aleykum en tenkihuhunne iza ateytumuhunne ucurahunn. vela tumsiku bi`isami-lkevafiri ves'elu ma enfaktum velyes'elu ma enfeku. zalikum hukmu-llah. yahkumu beynekum. vellahu `alimun hakim
vein fatekum sey'um min ezvacikum ile-lkuffari fe`akabtum featu-llezine zehebet ezvacuhum misle ma enfeku. vetteku-llahe-llezi entum bihi mu'minun

ya eyyuhe-nnebiyyu iza caeke-lmu'minatu yubayi`neke `ala el la yusrikne billahi sey'ev vela yesrikne vela yeznine vela yaktulne evladehunne vela ye'tine bibuhtaniy yefterinehu beyne eydihinne veerculihinne vela ya`sineke fi ma`rufin febayi`hunne vestagfir lehunne-llah. inne-llahe gafurur rahim
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu la tetevellev kavmen gadibe-llahu `aleyhim kad yeisu mine-l'ahirati kema yeise-lkuffaru min ashabi-lkubur
sebbeha lillahi ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. vehuve-l`azizu-lhakim
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu lime tekulune ma la tef`alun
kebura makten `inde-llahi en tekulu ma la tef`alun
inne-llahe yuhibbu-llezine yukatilune fi sebilihi saffen keennehum bunyanum mersus
veiz kale musa likavmihi ya kavmi lime tu'zuneni vekat ta`lemune enni rasulu-llahi ileykum. felemma zagu ezaga-llahu kulubehum. vellahu la yehdi-lkavme-lfasikin

veiz kale `ise-bnu meryeme ya beni israile inni rasulu-llahi ileykum musaddikal lima beyne yedeyye mine-ttevrati vemubessiram birasuliy ye'ti mim ba`di-smuhu ahmed. felemma caehum bilbeyyinati kalu haza sihrum mubin
vemen azlemu mimmeni-ftera `ale-llahi-lkezibe vehuve yud`a ile-l'islam. vellahu la yehdi-lkavme-zzalimin
yuridune liyutfiu nura-llahi biefvahihim vellahu mutimmu nurihi velev kerihe-lkafirun
huve-llezi ersele rasulehu bilhuda vedini-lhakki liyuzhirahu `ale-ddini kullihi velev kerihe-lmusrikun
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu hel edullukum `ala ticaratin tuncikum min `azabin elim
tu'minune billahi verasulihi vetucahidune fi sebili-llahi biemvalikum veenfusikum. zalikum hayrul lekum in kuntum ta`lemun
yagfir lekum zunubekum veyudhilkum cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu vemesakine tayyibeten fi cennati `adn. zalike-lfevzu-l`azim
veuhra tuhibbuneha. nasrum mine-llahi vefethun karib. vebessiri-lmu'minin

ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu kunu ensara-llahi kema kale `ise-bnu meryeme lilhavariyyine men ensari ile-llah. kale-lhavariyyune nahnu ensaru-llahi feamenet taifetum mim beni israile vekeferat taifeh. feeyyedne-llezine amenu `ala `aduvvihim feasbehu zahirin
yusebbihu lillahi ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ardi-lmeliki-lkuddusi-l`azizi-lhakim
huve-llezi be`ase fi-l'ummiyyine rasulem minhum yetlu `aleyhim ayatihi veyuzekkihim veyu`allimuhumu-lkitabe velhikmeh. vein kanu min kablu lefi dalalim mubin
veaharine minhum lemma yelhaku bihim. vehuve-l`azizu-lhakim
zalike fadlu-llahi yu'tihi mey yesa'. vellahu zu-lfadli-l`azim
meselu-llezine hummilu-ttevrate summe lem yahmiluha kemeseli-lhimari yahmilu esfara. bi'se meselu-lkavmi-llezine kezzebu biayati-llah. vellahu la yehdi-lkavme-zzalimin
kul ya eyyuhe-llezine hadu in za`amtum ennekum evliyau lillahi min duni-nnasi fetemennevu-lmevte in kuntum sadikin
vela yetemennevnehu ebedem bima kaddemet eydihim. vellahu `alimum bizzalimin
kul inne-lmevte-llezi tefirrune minhu feinnehu mulakikum summe turaddune ila `alimi-lgaybi vessehadeti feyunebbiukum bima kuntum ta`melun
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu iza nudiye lissalati miy yevmi-lcumu`ati fes`av ila zikri-llahi vezeru-lbey`. zalikum hayrul lekum in kuntum ta`lemun
feiza kudiyeti-ssaletu fentesiru fi-l'ardi vebtegu min fadli-llahi vezkuru-llahe kesiral le`allekum tuflihun
veiza raev ticaraten ev lehven-nfeddu ileyha veterakuke kaima. kul ma `inde-llahi hayrum mine-llehvi vemine-tticarah. vellahu hayru-rrazikin
iza caeke-lmunafikune kalu neshedu inneke lerasulu-llah. vellahu ya`lemu inneke lerasuluh. vellahu yeshedu inne-lmunafikine lekazibun
ittehazu eymanehum cunneten fesaddu `an sebili-llah. innehum sae ma kanu ya`melun
zalike biennehum amenu summe keferu fetubi`a `ala kulubihim fehum la yefkahun
veiza raeytehum tu`cibuke ecsamuhum. veiy yekulu tesma` likavlihim. keennehum husubum musennedeh. yahsebune kulle sayhatin `aleyhim. humu-l`aduvvu fahzerhum. katelehumu-llah. enna yu'fekun
veiza kile lehum te`alev yestagfir lekum rasulu-llahi levvev ruusehum veraeytehum yesuddune vehum mustekbirun
sevaun `aleyhim estagferte lehum em lem testagfir lehum. ley yagfira-llahu lehum. inne-llahe la yehdi-lkavme-lfasikin
humu-llezine yekulune la tunfiku `ala men `inde rasuli-llahi hatta yenfeddu. velillahi hazainu-ssemavati vel'ardi velakinne-lmunafikine la yefkahun
yekulune leir raca`na ile-lmedineti leyuhricenne-l'e`azzu minhe-l'ezell. velillahi-l`izzetu velirasulihi velilmu'minine velakinne-lmunafikine la ya`lemun
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu la tulhikum emvalukum vela evladukum `an zikri-llah. vemey yef`al zalike feulaike humu-lhasirun
veenfiku mimma razaknakum min kabli ey ye'tiye ehadekumu-lmevtu feyekule rabbi levla ehharteni ila ecelin karibin feessaddeka veekum mine-ssalihin
veley yu'ehhira-llahu nefsen iza cae eceluha. vellahu habirum bima ta`melun
yusebbihu lillahi ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. lehu-lmulku velehu-lhamd. vehuve `ala kulli sey'in kadir
huve-llezi halekakum feminkum kafiruv veminkum mu'min. vellahu bima ta`melune besir
haleka-ssemavati vel'arda bilhakki vesavverakum feahsene suverakum. veileyhi-lmesir
ya`lemu ma fi-ssemavati vel'ardi veya`lemu ma tusirrune vema tu`linun. vellahu `alimum bizati-ssudur
elem ye'tikum nebeu-llezine keferu min kabl. fezaku vebale emrihim velehum `azabun elim
zalike biennehu kanet te'tihim rusuluhum bilbeyyinati fekalu ebeseruy yehdunena. fekeferu vetevellev vestagne-llah. vellahu ganiyyun hamid
za`ame-llezine keferu el ley yub`asu. kul bela verabbi letub`asunne summe letunebbeunne bima `amiltum. vezalike `ale-llahi yesir
feaminu billahi verasulihi vennuri-llezi enzelna. vellahu bima ta`melune habir

yevme yecme`ukum liyevmi-lcem`i zalike yevmu-ttegabun. vemey yu'mim billahi veya`mel salihay yukeffir `anhu seyyiatihi veyudhilhu cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu halidine fiha ebeda. zalike-lfevzu-l`azim
vellezine keferu vekezzebu biayatina ulaike ashabu-nnari halidine fiha. vebi'se-lmesir
ma esabe mim musibetin illa biizni-llah. vemey yu'mim billahi yehdi kalbeh. vellahu bikulli sey'in `alim
veeti`u-llahe veeti`u-rrasul. fein tevelleytum feinnema `ala rasuline-lbelagu-lmubin
allahu la ilahe illa hu. ve`ale-llahi felyetevekkeli-lmu'minun
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu inne min ezvacikum veevladikum `aduvvel lekum fahzeruhum. vein ta`fu vetasfehu vetagfiru feinne-llahe gafurur rahim
innema emvalukum veevladukum fitnetun. vellahu `indehu ecrun `azim
fetteku-llahe me-steta`tum vesme`u veeti`u veenfiku hayral lienfusikum. vemey yuka suhha nefsihi feulaike humu-lmuflihun
in tukridu-llahe kardan haseney yuda`ifhu lekum veyagfir lekum. vellahu sekurun halim

ya eyyuhe-nnebiyyu iza tallaktumu-nnisae fetallikuhunne li`iddetihinne veahsu-l`iddeh. vetteku-llahe rabbekum. la tuhricuhunne mim buyutihinne vela yahrucne illa ey ye'tine bifahisetim mubeyyineh. vetilke hududu-llah. vemey yete`adde hudude-llahi fekad zaleme nefseh. la tedri le`alle-llahe yuhdisu ba`de zalike emra

feiza belagne ecelehunne feemsikuhunne bima`rufin ev farikuhunne bima`rufiv veeshidu zevey `adlim minkum veekimu-ssehadete lillah. zalikum yu`azu bihi men kane yu'minu billahi velyevmi-l'ahir. vemey yetteki-llahe yec`al lehu mahraca
veyerzukhu min haysu la yahtesib. vemey yetevekkel `ale-llahi fehuve hasbuh. inne-llahe baligu emrih. kad ce`ale-llahu likulli sey'in kadra

vellai yeisne mine-lmehidi min nisaikum ini-rtebtum fe`iddetuhunne selasetu eshuriv vellai lem yehidn. veulatu-l'ahmali eceluhunne ey yeda`ne hamlehunn. vemey yetteki-llahe yec`al lehu min emrihi yusra
zalike emru-llahi enzelehu ileykum. vemey yetteki-llahe yukeffir `anhu seyyiatihi veyu`zim lehu ecra

eskinuhunne min haysu sekentum miv vucdikum vela tudarruhunne litudayyiku `aleyhinn. vein kunne ulati hamlin feenfiku `aleyhinne hatta yeda`ne hamlehunn. fein erda`ne lekum featuhunne ucurahunn. ve'temiru beynekum bima`ruf. vein te`asertum feseturdi`u lehu uhra
liyunfik zu se`atim min se`atih. vemen kudira `aleyhi rizkuhu felyunfik mimma atahu-llah. la yukellifu-llahu nefsen illa ma ataha. seyec`alu-llahu ba`de `usriy yusra
vekeeyyim min karyetin `atet `an emri rabbiha verusulihi fehasebnaha hisaben sedidev ve`azzebnaha `azaben nukra
fezakat vebale emriha vekane `akibetu emriha husra
e`adde-llahu lehum `azaben sediden fetteku-llahe ya uli-l'elbab. ellezine amenu. kad enzele-llahu ileykum zikra

rasuley yetlu `aleykum ayati-llahi mubeyyinatil liyuhrice-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati mine-zzulumati ile-nnur. vemey yu'mim billahi veya`mel salihay yudhilhu cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu halidine fiha ebeda. kad ahsene-llahu lehu rizka
allahu-llezi haleka seb`a semavativ vemine-l'ardi mislehunn. yetenezzelu-l'emru beynehunne lita`lemu enne-llahe `ala kulli sey'in kadiruv veenne-llahe kad ehata bikulli sey'in `ilma
ya eyyuhe-nnebiyyu lime tuharrimu ma ehalle-llahu leke. tebtegi merdate ezvacik. vellahu gafurur rahim
kad ferada-llahu lekum tehillete eymanikum. vellahu mevlakum. vehuve-l`alimu-lhakim

veiz eserra-nnebiyyu ila ba`di ezvacihi hadisa. felemma nebbeet bihi veazherahu-llahu `aleyhi `arrafe ba`dahu vea`rada `am ba`d. felemma nebbeeha bihi kalet men embeeke haza. kale nebbeeniye-l`alimu-lhabir
in tetuba ile-llahi fekad sagat kulubukuma. vein tezahera `aleyhi feinne-llahe huve mevlahu vecibrilu vesalihu-lmu'minin. velmelaiketu ba`de zalike zahir
asa rabbuhu in tallekakunne ey yubdilehu ezvacen hayram minkunne muslimatim mu'minatin kanitatin taibatin `abidatin saihatin seyyibativ veebkara
ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu ku enfusekum veehlikum narav vekuduhe-nnasu velhicaratu `aleyha melaiketun gilazun sidadul la ya`sune-llahe ma emerahum veyef`alune ma yu'merun
ya eyyuhe-llezine keferu la ta`teziru-lyevm. innema tuczevne ma kuntum ta`melun

ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu tubu ile-llahi tevbeten nesuha. `asa rabbukum ey yukeffira `ankum seyyiatikum veyudhilekum cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu yevme la yuhzi-llahu-nnebiyye vellezine amenu me`ah. nuruhum yes`a beyne eydihim vebieymanihim yekulune rabbena etmim lena nurana vagfir lena. inneke `ala kulli sey'in kadir
ya eyyuhe-nnebiyyu cahidi-lkuffara velmunafikine vagluz `aleyhim. veme'vahum cehennem. vebi'se-lmesir
darabe-llahu meselel lillezine keferu-mraete nuhiv vemraete lut. kaneta tahte `abdeyni min `ibadina salihayni fehanetahuma felem yugniya `anhuma mine-llahi sey'ev vekile-dhule-nnara me`a-ddahilin
vedarabe-llahu meselel lillezine amenu-mraete fir`avn. iz kalet rabbi-bni li `indeke beyten fi-lcenneti veneccini min fir`avne ve`amelihi veneccini mine-lkavmi-zzalimin
vemeryeme-bnete `imrane-lleti ahsanet ferceha fenefahna fihi mir ruhina vesaddekat bikelimati rabbiha vekutubihi vekanet mine-lkanitin
tebarake-llezi biyedihi-lmulk. vehuve `ala kulli sey'in kadir
ellezi haleka-lmevte velhayate liyebluvekum eyyukum ahsenu `amela. vehuve-l`azizu-lgafur
ellezi haleka seb`a semavatin tibaka. ma tera fi halki-rrahmani min tefavut. ferci`i-lbesara hel tera min futur
summe-rci`i-lbesara kerrateyni yenkalib ileyke-lbesaru hasiev vehuve hasir
velekad zeyyenne-ssemae-ddunya bimesabiha vece`alnaha rucumel lisseyatini vea`tedna lehum `azabe-sse`ir
iza ulku fiha semi`u leha sehikav vehiye tefur
tekadu temeyyezu mine-lgayz. kullema ulkiye fiha fevcun seelehum hazenetuha elem ye'tikum nezir
kalu bela kad caena nezirun fekezzebna vekulna ma nezzele-llahu min sey'. in entum illa fi dalalin kebir
vekalu lev kunna nesme`u ev na`kilu ma kunna fi ashabi-sse`ir
inne-llezine yahsevne rabbehum bilgaybi lehum magfiratuv veecrun kebir
veesirru kavlekum evi-cheru bih. innehu `alimum bizati-ssudur
huve-llezi ce`ale lekumu-l'arda zelulen femsu fi menakibiha vekulu mir rizkih. veileyhi-nnusur
eemintum men fi-ssemai ey yahsife bikumu-l'arda feiza hiye temur
em emintum men fi-ssemai ey yursile `aleykum hasiba. feseta`lemune keyfe nezir
velekad kezzebe-llezine min kablihim fekeyfe kane nekir
evelem yerav ile-ttayri fevkahum saffativ veyakbidn. ma yumsikuhunne ille-rrahman. innehu bikulli sey'im besir
emmen haze-llezi huve cundul lekum yensurukum min duni-rrahman. ini-lkafirune illa fi gurur
emmen haze-llezi yerzukukum in emseke rizkah. bel leccu fi `utuvviv venufur
efemey yemsi mukibben `ala vechihi ehda emmey yemsi seviyyen `ala siratim mustekim
kul huve-llezi enseekum vece`ale lekumu-ssem`a vel'ebsara vel'ef'ideh. kalilem ma teskurun
kul huve-llezi zera'ekum fi-l'ardi veileyhi tuhserun
veyekulune meta haze-lva`du in kuntum sadikin
kul inneme-l`ilmu `inde-llah. veinnema ene nezirum mubin
felemma raevhu zulfeten siet vucuhu-llezine keferu vekile haze-llezi kuntum bihi tedde`un
kul era'eytum in ehlekeniye-llahu vemem me`iye ev rahimena femey yuciru-lkafirine min `azabin elim
kul huve-rrahmanu amenna bihi ve`aleyhi tevekkelna. feseta`lemune men huve fi dalalim mubin
kul era'eytum in asbeha maukum gavran femey ye'tikum bimaim me`in
inne rabbeke huve a`lemu bimen dalle `an sebilih. vehuve a`lemu bilmuhtedin
inna belevnahum kema belevna ashabe-lcenneh. iz aksemu leyasrimunneha musbihin
fetafe `aleyha taifum mir rabbike vehum naimun
kale evsetuhum elem ekul lekum levla tusebbihun
kalu subhane rabbina inna kunna zalimin
kalu ya veylena inna kunna tagin
asa rabbuna ey yubdilena hayram minha inna ila rabbina ragibun
kezalike-l`azab. vele`azabu-l'ahirati ekber. lev kanu ya`lemun
em lekum eymanun `aleyna baligatun ila yevmi-lkiyameti inne lekum lema tahkumun
em lehum suraka'. felye'tu bisurakaihim in kanu sadikin
yevme yuksefu `an sakiv veyud`avne ile-ssucudi fela yesteti`un
hasi`aten ebsaruhum terhekuhum zilleh. vekad kanu yud`avne ile-ssucudi vehum salimun
fezerni vemey yukezzibu bihaze-lhadis. senestedricuhum min haysu la ya`lemun
em tes'eluhum ecran fehum mim magramim muskalun
fasbir lihukmi rabbike vela tekun kesahibi-lhut. iz nada vehuve mekzum
levla en tedarakehu ni`metum mir rabbihi lenubize bil`arai vehuve mezmum
veiy yekadu-llezine keferu leyuzlikuneke biebsarihim lemma semi`u-zzikra veyekulune innehu lemecnun
sehharaha `aleyhim seb`a leyaliv vesemaniyete eyyamin husumen fetere-lkavme fiha sar`a keennehum a`cazu nahlin haviyeh
vecae fir`avnu vemen kablehu velmu'tefikatu bilhatieh
fe`asav rasule rabbihim feehazehum ahzeter rabiyeta
linec`aleha lekum tezkiratev vete`iyeha uzunuv va`iyeh
velmeleku `ala ercaiha. veyahmilu `arse rabbike fevkahum yevmeizin semaniyeh
yevmeizin tu`radune la tahfa minkum hafiyeh
feemma men utiye kitabehu biyeminihi feyekulu haumu-krau kitabiyeh
kulu vesrabu heniem bima esleftum fi-l'eyyami-lhaliyeh
veemma men utiye kitabehu bisimalihi feyekulu ya leyteni lem ute kitabiyeh
summe fi silsiletin zer`uha seb`une zira`an feslukuh
vema huve bikavli sa`ir. kalilem ma tu'minun
vela bikavli kahin. kalilem ma tezekkerun
ta`rucu-lmelaiketu verruhu ileyhi fi yevmin kane mikdaruhu hamsine elfe seneh
yubessarunehum. yeveddu-lmucrimu lev yeftedi min `azabi yevmiizim bibenih
illa `ala ezvacihim ev ma meleket eymanuhum feinnehum gayru melumin
eyatme`u kullu-mriim minhum ey yudhale cennete ne`im
fela uksimu birabbi-lmesariki velmegaribi inna lekadirun
ala en nubeddile hayram minhum vema nahnu bimesbukin
fezerhum yehudu veyel`abu hatta yulaku yevmehumu-llezi yu`adun
yevme yahrucune mine-l'ecdasi sira`an keennehum ila nusubiy yufidun
hasi`aten ebsaruhum terhekuhum zilleh. zalike-lyevmu-llezi kanu yu`adun
inna erselna nuhan ila kavmihi en enzir kavmeke min kabli ey ye'tiyehum `azabun elim
kale ya kavmi inni lekum nezirum mubin
yagfir lekum min zunubikum veyuehhirkum ila ecelim musemma. inne ecele-llahi iza cae la yu'ehhar. lev kuntum ta`lemun
kale rabbi inni de`avtu kavmi leylev venehara
veinni kullema de`avtuhum litagfira lehum ce`alu esabi`ahum fi azanihim vestagsev siyabehum veesarru vestekberu-stikbara
summe inni a`lentu lehum veesrartu lehum israra
veyumdidkum biemvaliv vebenine veyec`al lekum cennativ veyec`al lekum enhara
ma lekum la tercune lillahi vekara
elem terav keyfe haleka-llahu seb`a semavatin tibaka
kale nuhur rabbi innehum `asavni vettebe`u mel lem yezidhu maluhu veveleduhu illa hasara
vekalu la tezerunne alihetekum vela tezerunne veddev vela suva`av vela yeguse veye`uka venesra
vekad edallu kesira. vela tezidi-zzalimine illa dalala
mimma hatiatihim ugriku feudhilu naran felem yecidu lehum min duni-llahi ensara
vekale nuhur rabbi la tezer `ale-l'ardi mine-lkafirine deyyara
inneke in tezerhum yudillu `ibadeke vela yelidu illa faciran keffara
rabbi-gfir li velivalideyye velimen dehale beytiye mu'minev velilmu'minine velmu'minat. vela tezidi-zzalimine illa tebara
kul uhiye ileyye ennehu-steme`a neferum mine-lcinni fekalu inna semi`na kur'anen `aceba
yehdi ile-rrusdi feamenna bih. velen nusrike birabbina ehada
veennehu te`ala ceddu rabbina me-ttehaze sahibetev vela veleda
veenna zanenna el len tekule-l'insu velcinnu `ale-llahi keziba
veennehu kane ricalum mine-l'insi ye`uzune biricalim mine-lcinni fezaduhum raheka
veennehum zannu kema zanentum el ley yeb`ase-llahu ehada
veenna lemesne-ssemae fevecednaha muliet harasen sedidev vesuhuba
veenna kunna nak`udu minha meka`ide lissem`. femey yestemi`i-l'ane yecid lehu sihaber rasada
veenna la nedri eserrun uride bimen fi-l'ardi em erade bihim rabbuhum raseda
veenna minne-ssalihune veminna dune zalik. kunna taraika kideda
veenna zanenna el len nu`cize-llahe fi-l'ardi velen nu`cizehu heraba
veenna lemma semi`ne-lhuda amenna bih. femey yu'mim birabbihi fela yehafu bahsev vela raheka
veenna minne-lmuslimune veminne-lkasitun. femen esleme feulaike teharrav raseda
lineftinehum fih. vemey yu`rid `an zikri rabbihi yeslukhu `azaben sa`ada
veenne-lmesacide lillahi fela ted`u me`a-llahi ehada
veennehu lemma kame `abdu-llahi yed`uhu kadu yekunune `aleyhi libeda
kul innema ed`u rabbi vela usriku bihi ehada
kul inni la emliku lekum darrav vela raseda
kul inni ley yucirani mine-llahi ehaduv velen ecide min dunihi multehada
illa belagam mine-llahi verisalatih. vemey ya`si-llahe verasulehu feinne lehu nara cehenneme halidine fiha ebeda
hatta iza raev ma yu`adune feseya`lemune men ad`afu nasirav veekallu `adeda
kul in edri ekaribum ma tu`adune em yec`alu lehu rabbi emeda
illa meni-rteda mir rasulin feinnehu yesluku mim beyni yedeyhi vemin halfihi rasada
liya`leme en kad eblegu risalati rabbihim veehata bima ledeyhim veahsa kulle sey'in `adeda
inne nasiete-lleyli hiye eseddu vat'ev veakvemu kila
rabbu-lmesriki velmagribi la ilahe illa huve fettehizhu vekila
vasbir `ala ma yekulune vehcurhum hecran cemila
yevme tercufu-l'ardu velcibalu vekaneti-lcibalu kesibem mehila
inna erselna ileykum rasulen sahiden `aleykum kema erselna ila fir`avne rasula
fekeyfe tettekune in kefertum yevmey yec`alu-lvildane siba
essemau munfetirum bih. kane va`duhu mef`ula
inne hazihi tezkirah. femen sae-ttehaze ila rabbihi sebila

inne rabbeke ya`lemu enneke tekumu edna min suluseyi-lleyli venisfehu vesulusehu vetaifetum mine-llezine me`ak. vellahu yukaddiru-lleyle vennehar. `alime el len tuhsuhu fetabe `aleykum fakrau ma teyessera mine-lkur'an. `alime en seyekunu minkum merda veaharune yadribune fi-l'ardi yebtegune min fadli-llahi veaharune yukatilune fi sebili-llah. fakrau ma teyessera minhu veekimu-ssalate veatu-zzekate veakridu-llahe kardan hasena. vema tukaddimu lienfusikum min hayrin teciduhu `inde-llahi huve hayrav vea`zame ecra. vestagfiru-llah. inne-llahe gafurur rahim
fekale in haza illa sihruy yu'ser

vema ce`alna ashabe-nnari illa melaikeh. vema ce`alna `iddetehum illa fitnetel lillezine keferu liyesteykine-llezine utu-lkitabe veyezdade-llezine amenu imanev vela yertabe-llezine utu-lkitabe velmu'minune veliyekule-llezine fi kulubihim meraduv velkafirune maza erade-llahu bihaza mesela. kezalike yudillu-llahu mey yesau veyehdi mey yesa'. vema ya`lemu cunude rabbike illa hu. vema hiye illa zikra lilbeser
limen sae minkum ey yetekaddeme ev yeteehhar
bel yuridu kullu-mriim minhum ey yu'ta suhufem munesserah
vema yezkurune illa ey yesae-llah. huve ehlu-ttakva veehlu-lmagfirah
la tuharrik bihi lisaneke lita`cele bih
elem yeku nutfetem mim meniyyiy yumna
hel eta `ale-l'insani hinum mine-ddehri lem yekun sey'em mezkura
inna halakne-l'insane min nutfetin emsac. nebtelihi fece`alnahu semi`am besira
inna hedeynahu-ssebile imma sakirav veimma kefura
inna a`tedna lilkafirine selasile veaglalev vese`ira
inne-l'ebrara yesrabune min ke'sin kane mizacuha kafura
yufune binnezri veyehafune yevmen kane serruhu mustetira
innema nut`imukum livechi-llahi la nuridu minkum cezaev vela sukura
inna nehafu mir rabbina yevmen `abusen kamtarira
fevekahumu-llahu serra zalike-lyevmi velekkahum nadratev vesurura
muttekiine fiha `ale-l'eraik. la yeravne fiha semsev vela zemherira
veyutafu `aleyhim bianiyetim min fiddativ veekvabin kanet kavarira
veyuskavne fiha ke'sen kane mizacuha zencebila
veyetufu `aleyhim vildanum muhalledun. iza raeytehum hasibtehum lu'luem mensura
veiza raeyte semme raeyte ne`imev vemulken kebira
aliyehum siyabu sundusin hudruv veistebrak. vehullu esavira min fiddah. vesekahum rabbuhum seraben tahura
inne haza kane lekum cezaev vekane sa`yukum meskura
fasbir lihukmi rabbike vela tuti` minhum asimen ev kefura
vemine-lleyli fescud lehu vesebbihhu leylen tavila
inne haulai yuhibbune-l`acilete veyezerune veraehum yevmen sekila
nahnu halaknahum vesededna esrahum. veiza si'na beddelna emsalehum tebdila
inne hazihi tezkirah. femen sae-ttehaze ila rabbihi sebila
vema tesaune illa ey yesae-llah. inne-llahe kane `alimen hakima
yudhilu mey yesau fi rahmetih. vezzalimine e`adde lehum `azaben elima
vece`alna fiha ravasiye samihativ veeskaynakum maen furata
intaliku ila ma kuntum bihi tukezzibun
intaliku ila zillin zi selasi su`ab
kulu vesrabu heniem bima kuntum ta`melun
la yezukune fiha berdev vela seraba
la yesme`une fiha lagvev vela kizzaba
rabbi-ssemavati vel'ardi vema beynehume-rrahmani la yemlikune minhu hitaba
yevme yekumu-rruhu velmelaiketu saffa. la yetekellemune illa men ezine lehu-rrahmanu vekale savaba
zalike-lyevmu-lhakk. femen sae-ttehaze ila rabbihi meaba
inna enzernakum `azaben kariba. yevme yenzuru-lmeru ma kaddemet yedahu veyekulu-lkafiru ya leyteni kuntu turaba
fekul hel leke ila en tezekka
inne fi zalike le`ibratel limey yahsa
veemma men hafe mekame rabbihi venehe-nnefse `ani-lheva
keennehum yevme yeravneha lem yelbesu illa `asiyyeten ev duhaha
vema tesaune illa ey yesae-llahu rabbu-l`alemin
fi eyyi suratim ma sae rakkebek
yevme la temliku nefsul linefsin sey'a. vel'emru yevmeizil lillah
vema yukezzibu bihi illa kullu mu`tedin esim
kella bel rane `ala kulubihim ma kanu yeksibun
summe yukalu haze-llezi kuntum bihi tukezzibun
inne-llezine ecramu kanu mine-llezine amenu yadhakun
veiza raevhum kalu inne haulai ledallun
ya eyyuhe-l'insanu inneke kadihun ila rabbike kedhan femulakih
veemma men utiye kitabehu verae zahrih
bela. inne rabbehu kane bihi besira
ille-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati lehum ecrun gayru memnun
vema nekamu minhum illa ey yu'minu billahi-l`azizi-lhamid
ellezi lehu mulku-ssemavati vel'ard. vellahu `ala kulli sey'in sehid
inne-llezine fetenu-lmu'minine velmu'minati summe lem yetubu felehum `azabu cehenneme velehum `azabu-lharik
inne-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati lehum cennatun tecri min tahtihe-l'enhar. zalike-lfevzu-lkebir
fema lehu min kuvvetiv vela nasir
illa ma sae-llah. innehu ya`lemu-lcehra vema yahfa
summe la yemutu fiha vela yahya
leyse lehum ta`amun illa min dari
la yusminu vela yugni min cu
hel fi zalike kasemul lizi hicr
elem tera keyfe fe`ale rabbuke bi`ad
feemme-l'insanu iza me-btelahu rabbuhu feekramehu vene``amehu feyekulu rabbi ekramen
veemma iza me-btelahu fekadera `aleyhi rizkahu feyekulu rabbi ehanen
vecie yevmeizim bicehenneme yevmeiziy yetezekkeru-l'insanu veenna lehu-zzikra
ev it`amun fi yevmin zi mesgabeh
summe kane mine-llezine amenu vetevasav bissabri vetevasav bilmerhameh
fekezzebuhu fe`akaruha. fedemdeme `aleyhim rabbuhum bizembihim fesevvaha
ille-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati felehum ecrun gayru memnun
kella leil lem yentehi lenesfe`am binnasiyeh
tenezzelu-lmelaiketu verruhu fiha biizni rabbihim. min kulli emr
lem yekuni-llezine keferu min ehli-lkitabi velmusrikine munfekkine hatta te'tiyehumu-lbeyyineh
vema teferraka-llezine utu-lkitabe illa mim ba`di ma caethumu-lbeyyineh
vema umiru illa liya`budu-llahe muhlisine lehu-ddine hunefae veyukimu-ssalate veyu'tu-zzekate vezalike dinu-lkayyimeh
inne-llezine keferu min ehli-lkitabi velmusrikine fi nari cehenneme halidine fiha. ulaike hum serru-lberiyyeh
inne-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati ulaike hum hayru-lberiyyeh
cezauhum `inde rabbihim cennatu `adnin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu halidine fiha ebeda. radiye-llahu `anhum veradu `anh. zalike limen hasiye rabbeh
femey ya`mel miskale zerratin hayray yerah
vemey ya`mel miskale zerratin serray yerah
efela ya`lemu iza bu`sira ma fi-lkubur
ille-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati vetevasav bilhakki vetevasav bissabr
elem tera keyfe fe`ale rabbuke biashabi-lfil
ellezi at`amehum min cu`iv veamenehum min havf
fesebbih bihamdi rabbike vestagfirh. innehu kane tevvaba
